title: Can't install Truffle on Mac OSX
body:
[errorsInInstallingTruffle.txt](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/files/926552/errorsInInstallingTruffle.txt)

## Issue

**What the issue is, in broad strokes.**

'$npm install -g truffle' succeeds part-way then fails. 

## Steps to Reproduce

**Please provide the shortest amount of steps to reproduce your issue.**

   $ npm install -g truffle


## Expected Behavior

**What you expected to happen.**

Install truffle.

## Actual Results

**What actually happened. Please give examples and support it with screenshots, copied output or error messages.**


    SolidityProjects$ npm install -g truffle
npm WARN deprecated libp2p-ipfs@0.15.0: Renamed to libp2p-ipfs-nodejs
npm WARN deprecated jade@0.26.3: Jade has been renamed to pug, please install the latest version of pug instead of jade
npm WARN deprecated to-iso-string@0.0.2: to-iso-string has been deprecated, use @segment/to-iso-string instead.
npm WARN deprecated minimatch@0.3.0: Please update to minimatch 3.0.2 or higher to avoid a RegExp DoS issue
/usr/local/bin/truffle -> /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/cli.js
/usr/local/bin/truffle-exec -> /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/exec.js

> fsevents@1.1.1 install /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/node_modules/fsevents
> node install

[fsevents] Success: "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/node_modules/fsevents/lib/binding/Release/node-v51-darwin-x64/fse.node" is installed via remote

> sha3@1.2.0 install /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/node_modules/sha3
> node-gyp rebuild

  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/sha3/src/addon.o
c++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-stdlib=libc++’
make: *** [Release/obj.target/sha3/src/addon.o] Error 1
gyp ERR! build error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:276:23)
gyp ERR! stack     at emitTwo (events.js:106:13)
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:194:7)
gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:215:12)
gyp ERR! System Darwin 16.5.0
gyp ERR! command "/usr/local/Cellar/node/7.9.0/bin/node" "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js" "rebuild"
gyp ERR! cwd /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/node_modules/sha3
gyp ERR! node -v v7.9.0

gyp ERR! not ok

└── (empty)

npm ERR! Darwin 16.5.0

npm ERR! node v7.9.0
npm ERR! npm  v4.2.0
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1

npm ERR! sha3@1.2.0 install: `node-gyp rebuild`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the sha3@1.2.0 install script 'node-gyp rebuild'.
npm ERR! Make sure you have the latest version of node.js and npm installed.
npm ERR! If you do, this is most likely a problem with the sha3 package,
npm ERR! not with npm itself.
npm ERR! Tell the author that this fails on your system:
npm ERR!     node-gyp rebuild
npm ERR! You can get information on how to open an issue for this project with:
npm ERR!     npm bugs sha3
npm ERR! Or if that isn't available, you can get their info via:
npm ERR!     npm owner ls sha3
npm ERR! There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! Please include the following file with any support request:

    SolidityProjects$ 






## Environment

* Operating System: OSX 10.12.4


* Truffle version: Most recent?



* Ethereum client: geth [? is this what you mean...]

    SolidityProjects$ geth
    INFO [04-17|20:56:36] Starting peer-to-peer node               instance=Geth/v1.6.0-stable-facc47cb/darwin-amd64/go1.8.1
    INFO [04-17|20:56:39] Initialising Ethereum protocol           versions="[63 62]" network=1

* node version: v7.9.0




* npm version: 4.2.0

Hey Gregory, 

I've experienced this error in a few situations but not with this project. I am running your same environment and was able to install truffle without any issues.  

A few things you can look at: 

1. Make sure you have the Xcode command line tools installed. 
2. Make sure you have Python 2.7 in your path (above 3.0 if installed) 
3. If this above doesn't help try just installing `sha3` package, this may give you some more verbose error messages. 

Just a few thoughts... good luck!

Hi there. A new beta has been pushed out that should fix this issue. Details in the blog post [here](http://truffleframework.com/blog/how-were-making-installation-issues-a-thing-of-the-past). Can you give it a shot and report back?

@tcoulter `npm install -g truffle@beta` works fine for me running Mac OS Sierra v10.12.5

Now onto dev. Thanks!

$ npm install truffle-contract
-bash: $: command not found

same issue

> $ npm install truffle-contract
> -bash: $: command not found

same issue for me

> same issue
> 
> > $ npm install truffle-contract
> > -bash: $: command not found
> 
> same issue for me

I had the same issues until i realized i'd copied the whole line from the truffle GitHub repo.  Remove the "$"
i have same issue help plz?

> Hey Gregory,
> 
> I've experienced this error in a few situations but not with this project. I am running your same environment and was able to install truffle without any issues.
> 
> A few things you can look at:
> 
> 1. Make sure you have the Xcode command line tools installed.
> 2. Make sure you have Python 2.7 in your path (above 3.0 if installed)
> 3. If this above doesn't help try just installing `sha3` package, this may give you some more verbose error messages.
> 
> Just a few thoughts... good luck!

Had the same issue, fixed by installing Xcode. Thanks
